metadata.name: C/2022 E3 - Proposal Step 1
metadata.description:
C/2022 E3 - Proposal Step 1 - 5th February 2023

Under the night sky and the northern lights of Iceland, I ask my girlfriend the all-important question....

With it the green shining comet C/2022 E3, which is to be seen only every 50,000 years.

Depending on what her answer will be, you can burn your Step 1 token and get Step 2. Be sure, at the end of this journey we will have experienced a story together. So maybe it makes sense to always keep a Step. 

And of course there is a roadmap for this story. We'll see if it goes according to plan or if I have to think of alternatives.
